events.comment: Block player input on start until game was inited

sub-events.comment: Simple tap processing by objects priority
Global notification object can only be managed from the main storyline containing player
As game objects clicking processed here always has the highest input priority we can process input on all the other objects here
Input state specific "end of touch" processing here
Change stage context and render current UI action on stage
Inject custom event with name "auto_talk_start_" + NPC id to start talking

events.comment: Set horizontal speed to 0 because it is not logically set to 0 when platform is disabled
